item.title: Delete npc?

@John459 wrote:

You guys are retarded. I’m talking when you spawn an npc by doing something like this:

server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(123, 2388, 5097, 0, false);

Like for fight caves. If a player leaves without killing all the monsters I want them to be removed.

item.title: Delete npc?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Right now I have this method in my server:

public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height, boolean respawns) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), height, absX + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 0, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), respawns); }

I want to make a code that does the oppisite of that, a deleteNpc code.

I tried this:

public void RemoveSpawnNpc(client c) {//removes the npc for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) { if (npcs[i] != null) { npcs[i].absX = -1; npcs[i].absY = -1; npcs[i].IsDead = true; npcs[i].Respawns = false; npcs[i].heightLevel = -1; npcs[i].faceplayer(0); npcs[i].playerName = ""; npcs[i].playerId = 0; npcs[i].inCombat = false; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].combatTimer = -1; IsDropping = false; } } }

But that didn’t work. Can someone give me a delete npc code?

Read full topic
